title: Which technologies used by big websites to load fast web pages and how they use it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Facebook uses BigPipe technology to load its page faster. Refer this link for more detailsBigPipe is a fundamental redesign of the dynamic web page serving system. The general idea is to decompose web pages into small chunks called pagelets, and pipeline them through several execution stages inside web servers and browsers.
